Games

Here are just a few of the games I've created. All of them are on github, so you can see the source code if you want to learn something.

Ludum Dare 29 28 Apr 2014

This has been my best Ludum Dare so far. I've used Phaser to create a nice little platformer.

Attack from above 21 Apr 2014

After a short break away I thought I would get back into the swing of things with a quick game. I was going to enter the Ludum Dare warm-up but due to other commitments I didn't make it. This game was put together in a day, and still needs some work, but it is playable, so give it a go.

Ludum Dare 26 29 Apr 2013

So I entered anther Ludum Dare, with the theme was 'Minimalism'. I decided to build a game I've had in mind for a while. It is base in the classic Amega game 'Atoms'. To make it more confusing for me, I thought I would do a hexagonal grid.

Ludum Dare 25 17 Dec 2012

After the warm up weekend I felt more prepared to build a game that the first Ludum Dare competition. The theme was 'You are the Villain', but it was nearly the 'end of the world' (due to the Mayan calendar ending). I took both themes on to spice it up.

Ludum Dare 24 27 Aug 2012

My first entry into the Ludum Dare competition. It's a game competition when you have to build a game based on a theme within 48 hours. The theme was 'Evolution'. As this was my first entry, I was feeling a little daunted by the whole process, but I made it.

Experiments

Ludum Dare 25 - warm up 08 Dec 2012

After the first Ludum Dare I felt like a needed to prepare more, and so I took the opportunity to create a little JavaScript scene to test out some particle physics.
